title: Fukuyama-san
description:
A collection of seven doujinshi chapters for the Fukuyama-san series by Fuetakishi.
Chapter numbering/naming are all over the place. This is the order that the chapters are listed in the official release

1) Fukuyama-san: Soushuuhen Ichi
2) Fukuyama-san
3) Fukuyama-san 2: Kon
4) Fukuyama-san 2: Shima
5) Fukuyama-san 3: Daifunka (Fukuyama-san 3: Eruption)
6) Fukuyama-san 3: Watashi wo Umi ni Tsuretette (Fukuyama-san 3: Take Me to the Sea)
7) Fukuyama-san 4: Ryojou Hen (Fukuyama-san 4: The Travel Chapter)

Other chapters in this series have not yet been collected into a release/tankoubon.
